html:
** Shares of sensor maker Velodyne Lidar Inc VLDR.O up 88% at $7.09 after Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O receives warrant to purchase up to 39.6 mln of co's shares

** Warrant may be exercised at any time before Feb. 4, 2030 at a price of $4.18/shr

** Amazon has the right to designate an observer to co's board if the number of shares that it or its affiliates hold equals at least 12.3 mln

** Last year, VLDR shares lost 79.6% of their market value


(Reporting by Kannaki Deka in Bengaluru)

(( Kannaki.Deka@thomsonreuters.com ))
